item.title: Battery energy storage use cases and outcome revenues streams
item.description: Energy storage has been around for a long time. Alessandro Volta invented the battery in 1800. Until recently, Batteries used to provide power at those locations where no grid connection is present, like for starter motors cars, mobile phones, laptops and other electronic devices or for emergency power or computer servers.Â With the last innovations in the energy storage industry, it is clear that energy storage technology and solutions will become crucial element in our life.
